definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: father of Boaz Ru 4:21 (LXX Salman, A LXXL -mwn, = [[שַׂלְמֶה]] v:Ru 4:20 (LXX id.; rd. prob. [[מוֹן]]-), hence [[שַׂלְמָא]] 1Ch 2:11, 1Ch 2:11 (Salmwn), also (as father of Bethlehem, on identity v. Be Now:Ruth) v:1Ch 2:51, v:1Ch 2:54 (Salwmwn, LXXL Sam(a)a)—? rd. [[שַׂלְמוֹן]] in all.
